SELECT ROW(1, 2) < ROW(1, 3) AS "true"
SELECT ROW(1, 2) < ROW(1, 1) AS "false"

SELECT ROW(1, 2, 3) < ROW(1, 3, NULL) AS "true"

SELECT ROW(11, 'ABC') > ROW(11, 'DEF') AS "false"
SELECT ROW(12, 'ABC') > ROW(11, 'DEF') AS "true"

SELECT ROW(1, 2, 3) = ROW(1, NULL, 4) AS "false"
SELECT ROW(1, 2, 3) <> ROW(1, NULL, 4) AS "true"
SELECT ROW('ABC', 'DEF') ~<=~ ROW('DEF', 'ABC') AS "true"
SELECT ROW('ABC', 'DEF') ~>=~ ROW('DEF', 'ABC') AS "false"
SELECT ROW('ABC', 'DEF') ~~ ROW('DEF', 'ABC') AS fail
SELECT ROW(1, 2) = ROW(1, CAST(2 AS BIGINT))
SELECT ROW(1, 2) IN (ROW(3, 4), ROW(1, 2))
SELECT ROW(1, 2) IN (ROW(3, 4), ROW(1, CAST(2 AS BIGINT)))

SELECT CAST(ROW(1, 2) AS testtype1) = CAST(ROW(1, 2) AS testtype1)
SELECT CAST(ROW(1, 2) AS testtype1) <> CAST(ROW(1, 3) AS testtype1)

SELECT CAST(ROW(1, -2) AS testtype1) = CAST(ROW(1, -3) AS testtype1)
SELECT CAST(ROW(1, -2) AS testtype1) <> CAST(ROW(1, -2) AS testtype1)
SELECT CAST(ROW(1, -3) AS testtype1) >= CAST(ROW(1, -2) AS testtype1)
SELECT CAST(ROW(1, -3) AS testtype1) > CAST(ROW(1, -2) AS testtype1)

expected: DROP TYPE testtype1, testtype3, testtype5, testtype6

SELECT CAST(ROW(1, 3) AS testtype1) *>= CAST(ROW(1, 2) AS testtype1)
SELECT CAST(ROW(1, 3) AS testtype1) *> CAST(ROW(1, 2) AS testtype1)
SELECT CAST(ROW(1, -2) AS testtype1) *< CAST(ROW(1, -3) AS testtype1)
SELECT CAST(ROW(1, -2) AS testtype1) *<= CAST(ROW(1, -3) AS testtype1)
SELECT CAST(ROW(1, -2) AS testtype1) *= CAST(ROW(1, -3) AS testtype1)
SELECT CAST(ROW(1, -2) AS testtype1) *<> CAST(ROW(1, -2) AS testtype1)
SELECT CAST(ROW(1, -3) AS testtype1) *>= CAST(ROW(1, -2) AS testtype1)
SELECT CAST(ROW(1, -3) AS testtype1) *> CAST(ROW(1, -2) AS testtype1)

query: create type testtype2 as (a smallint, b bool)

SELECT CAST(ROW(0, FALSE) AS testtype2) *<> CAST(ROW(0, TRUE) AS testtype2)

query: UPDATE price SET active = true, price = input_prices.price FROM unnest(ARRAY[(10, 123.00), (11, 99.99)]::price_input[]) input_prices WHERE price_key_from_table(price.*) = price_key_from_input(input_prices.*)
expected: UPDATE price SET active = TRUE, price = input_prices.price FROM unnest(CAST(ARRAY[(10, 123.00),(11, 99.99)] AS price_input[])) AS input_prices WHERE price_key_from_table(price.*) = price_key_from_input(input_prices.*)
SELECT * FROM price
ROLLBACK

query: select r, r is null as isnull, r is not null as isnotnull from (values (1,row(1,2)), (1,row(null,null)), (1,null), (null,row(1,2)), (null,row(null,null)), (null,null) ) r(a,b)
expected: SELECT r, r IS NULL AS isnull, r IS NOT NULL AS isnotnull FROM (VALUES (1, ROW(1, 2)), (1, ROW(NULL, NULL)), (1, NULL), (NULL, ROW(1, 2)), (NULL, ROW(NULL, NULL)), (NULL, NULL)) AS r(a, b)

query: explain (verbose, costs off) with r(a,b) as materialized (values (1,row(1,2)), (1,row(null,null)), (1,null), (null,row(1,2)), (null,row(null,null)), (null,null) ) select r, r is null as isnull, r is not null as isnotnull from r
expected: EXPLAIN (VERBOSE true, COSTS false) WITH r(a, b) AS MATERIALIZED (VALUES (1, ROW(1, 2)), (1, ROW(NULL, NULL)), (1, NULL), (NULL, ROW(1, 2)), (NULL, ROW(NULL, NULL)), (NULL, NULL)) SELECT r, r IS NULL AS isnull, r IS NOT NULL AS isnotnull FROM r

query: with r(a,b) as materialized (values (1,row(1,2)), (1,row(null,null)), (1,null), (null,row(1,2)), (null,row(null,null)), (null,null) ) select r, r is null as isnull, r is not null as isnotnull from r
expected: WITH r(a, b) AS MATERIALIZED (VALUES (1, ROW(1, 2)), (1, ROW(NULL, NULL)), (1, NULL), (NULL, ROW(1, 2)), (NULL, ROW(NULL, NULL)), (NULL, NULL)) SELECT r, r IS NULL AS isnull, r IS NOT NULL AS isnotnull FROM r

query: explain (verbose, costs off) with cte(c) as materialized (select row(1, 2)), cte2(c) as (select * from cte) select * from cte2 as t where (select * from (select c as c1) s where (select (c1).f1 > 0)) is not null
expected: EXPLAIN (VERBOSE true, COSTS false) WITH cte(c) AS MATERIALIZED (SELECT ROW(1, 2)), cte2(c) AS (SELECT * FROM cte) SELECT * FROM cte2 AS t WHERE (SELECT * FROM (SELECT c AS c1) AS s WHERE (SELECT (c1).f1 > 0)) IS NOT NULL

query: with cte(c) as materialized (select row(1, 2)), cte2(c) as (select * from cte) select * from cte2 as t where (select * from (select c as c1) s where (select (c1).f1 > 0)) is not null
expected: WITH cte(c) AS MATERIALIZED (SELECT ROW(1, 2)), cte2(c) AS (SELECT * FROM cte) SELECT * FROM cte2 AS t WHERE (SELECT * FROM (SELECT c AS c1) AS s WHERE (SELECT (c1).f1 > 0)) IS NOT NULL

query: create view composite_v as with cte(c) as materialized (select row(1, 2)), cte2(c) as (select * from cte) select 1 as one from cte2 as t where (select * from (select c as c1) s where (select (c1).f1 > 0)) is not null
expected: CREATE VIEW composite_v AS WITH cte(c) AS MATERIALIZED (SELECT ROW(1, 2)), cte2(c) AS (SELECT * FROM cte) SELECT 1 AS one FROM cte2 AS t WHERE (SELECT * FROM (SELECT c AS c1) AS s WHERE (SELECT (c1).f1 > 0)) IS NOT NULL
SELECT pg_get_viewdef('composite_v', TRUE)
DROP VIEW composite_v

query: explain (verbose, costs off) select (ss.a).x, (ss.a).n from (select information_schema._pg_expandarray(array[1,2]) AS a) ss
expected: EXPLAIN (VERBOSE true, COSTS false) SELECT (ss.a).x, (ss.a).n FROM (SELECT information_schema._pg_expandarray(ARRAY[1,2]) AS a) AS ss

query: explain (verbose, costs off) select (ss.a).x, (ss.a).n from (select information_schema._pg_expandarray(array[1,2]) AS a) ss where false
expected: EXPLAIN (VERBOSE true, COSTS false) SELECT (ss.a).x, (ss.a).n FROM (SELECT information_schema._pg_expandarray(ARRAY[1,2]) AS a) AS ss WHERE FALSE

query: explain (verbose, costs off) with cte(c) as materialized (select row(1, 2)), cte2(c) as (select * from cte) select (c).f1 from cte2 as t
expected: EXPLAIN (VERBOSE true, COSTS false) WITH cte(c) AS MATERIALIZED (SELECT ROW(1, 2)), cte2(c) AS (SELECT * FROM cte) SELECT (c).f1 FROM cte2 AS t

query: explain (verbose, costs off) with cte(c) as materialized (select row(1, 2)), cte2(c) as (select * from cte) select (c).f1 from cte2 as t where false
expected: EXPLAIN (VERBOSE true, COSTS false) WITH cte(c) AS MATERIALIZED (SELECT ROW(1, 2)), cte2(c) AS (SELECT * FROM cte) SELECT (c).f1 FROM cte2 AS t WHERE FALSE

query: CREATE TABLE compositetable(a text, b text)
expected: CREATE TABLE compositetable (a TEXT, b TEXT)
INSERT INTO compositetable (a, b) VALUES ('fa', 'fb')

query: SELECT d.a FROM (SELECT compositetable AS d FROM compositetable) s
expected: SELECT d.a FROM (SELECT compositetable AS d FROM compositetable) AS s

query: SELECT (d).a, (d).b FROM (SELECT compositetable AS d FROM compositetable) s
expected: SELECT (d).a, (d).b FROM (SELECT compositetable AS d FROM compositetable) AS s

query: SELECT (d).ctid FROM (SELECT compositetable AS d FROM compositetable) s
expected: SELECT (d).ctid FROM (SELECT compositetable AS d FROM compositetable) AS s
SELECT (CAST(NULL AS compositetable)).nonexistent
SELECT (CAST(NULL AS compositetable)).a
SELECT (CAST(NULL AS compositetable)).oid
